visualization_prompt: Generate a solid gauge chart showing performance metrics using threshold-based color encoding
visualization_explanation: The visualization presents a univariate performance metric through a solid gauge chart. The dataset contains a single quantitative variable (performance score) scaled 0-100, with synthetic data point 63 representing current status. The red plotline at 35 establishes a critical threshold. Chart design follows Tufte's principles by maximizing data-ink ratio through minimal tick marks and removed legend. Cairo's perceptual effectiveness is achieved through: 1) Color contrast between green value indicator and red threshold 2) Size hierarchy (30px data label dominates 20px axis labels) 3) Spatial grouping of arc elements. The semicircular layout reduces chart footprint while maintaining proportional interpretation. Synthetic data maintains domain validity (0-100 scale for percentages) with μ=63 positioned between warning threshold (35) and maximum value.
